item.title: Processing Satellite Wind Speed Data with R
item.description: The Advanced Scatterometer (ASCAT) winds products are processed by NOAA/NESDIS utilizing measurements from the scatterometer instrument aboard the EUMETSAT Metop satellites. The instrument uses radar to measure backscatter to determine speed and direction of winds over the surface of the oceans. ASCAT observations fields have regular spatial resolutions of 0.25Â° in longitude and latitude. The daily wind fields are calculated in near real time with a delay of 48 hours.
